full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DIR DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR DU BYA BA'I TSUL NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGRUBS 'DI NYID, PAN CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS KYI MI GSAL BA RNAMS DER GANG GSUNG LTAR NGAG 'DON 'BA' ZHIG GO BDE BAR BSGRIGS PA 'DI NI GROGS MCHOG DAM PA AER KHA DAR KHAN GNYER BA'I KHA 'DON DU, ,GNAS LNGA RIG PA'I DZA YA PAndI TA CHEN PO'I BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL BA BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GYIS RJE NYID KYI GSUNG JI LTA BA BZHIN BSGRIGS SHING BSGYUR BA'O, ,'DI KYANG RGYAL GNYIS PA'I RING LUGS PHYOGS DUS KUN TU RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,) SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,
